<wiki:toc/>

There are a number of samples included in the Google API Client Library for PHP that demonstrate the basic functions using the Google+ API, as well as doing high-fidelity rendering of Google+ posts, you can find these in the google-api-php-client/examples directory. 

[http://code.google.com/p/google-api-php-client/source/browse/#svn/trunk/examples Examples source]

= Helper code =
The Google API Client Library for PHP also provides convenience wrapper code for a number of APIs. The wrappers make accessing these APIs even more intuitive.  Visit the [http://code.google.com/p/google-api-php-client/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fsrc%2Fcontrib contrib directory] to see if wrapper code is available for the API you are using.
